column4: Hi all, I'm trying to figure out which version of GCC is installed.  With gcc --version I see: gcc (GCC) 4.1.2 20060928 (prerelease) (Ubuntu 4.1.1-13ubuntu5) ...  I am trying to set up distcc so its important to know which version I'm running, but I can't tell from the output if this is 4.1.1 or 4.1.2    Anyone know?  thanks
it is 4.1.1 with patches that made it into 4.1.2 :-(
i would use 4.1.2 as the version
